title: Bug 4121: JarExporter causes out of sync
description: JarExporter causes out of sync error when exporting and overwriting a jar file in the same directory.
OB: When exporting a directory (project) and placing the exported jar in the same directory, an out of sync message is displayed when attempting to overwrite the exported jar file for the second time.
EB: The system should allow the exported jar file to be overwritten without triggering an out of sync error message.
SR:
1. Open a project
2. Export the project as a jar file
3. Place the exported jar file in the same directory
4. Attempt to overwrite the exported jar file
5. Observe the out of sync error message
